quotes.quote: A true leader always keeps an element of surprise up his sleeve, which others cannot grasp but which keeps his public excited and breathless.
He was free to enjoy the breathless glee that overwhelmed him: the speed, the clear cold air, the total silence, the feeling of balance and excitement and peace.
A good novel rushes you forward like a skiff down a stream, and you arrive at the end, perhaps breathless, but unexhausted
There must be always remaining in every life, some place for the singing of angels, some place for that which in itself is breathless and beautiful.
Sometimes, people trying to commit suicide manage it in a manner that leaves them breathless with astonishment.
It was less like seeing than like being for the first time seen, knocked breathless by a powerful glance.
You are that one breath. that puts all the remaining breaths. back into my body.
Many of us pursue pleasure with such breathless haste that we hurry past it.
May our twilights mix togetherlike breath and breathlessness.
People are so wonderful that a photographer has only to wait for that breathless moment to capture what he wants on film.
Like tourists huffing and puffing to reach the peak we forget the view on the way up.
Sometimes it's the same moments that take your breath away that breathe purpose and love back into your life.
All Heaven and Earth are still, though not in sleep, but breathless, as we grow when feeling most.
Breathless, we flung us on a windy hill, laughed in the sun, and kissed the lovely grass.
Breathless and unharmed, we emerge from the mazes of metaphysics and psychology where man and the soul are playing hide-and-seek.
